title: Devilish and Delicious
description: Dear Reader,Like you, we are readers and lovers of romance. In fact, as authors we have the best of both worlds. We not only get to read what we love, but we get to write it too. Nestled in these few pages are four excerpts from our current and upcoming releases. We chose them especially with you, the reader, in mind to give you a taste of our delicious, devilish heroes and the spirited women who capture their hearts. So read on, and enjoy romance that Burns and is a little bit on the Wilde side.Happy Reading,Emma & Monica
author: Monica Burns
